entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
